metadata.title: CVE-2016-10376 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Gajim through 0.16.7 unconditionally implements the "XEP-0146: RemoteControlling Clients" extension. This can be abused by malicious XMPPservers to, for example, extract plaintext from OTR encrypted sessions.

criterions.comment: gajim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
